text: The Beano is a weekly British children's comic. The first issue was on July 30, 1938. Annuals are released each year. ==Beano characters== *Dennis the Menace *The Bash Street Kids *Little Plum *Ball Boy *Ivy the Terrible *Billy Whizz *Ratz *Robbie Rebel *Gnasher *Gnipper *Lord Snooty *Les Pretend *Stanley the Rottweiler *Billy the Cat *Rodger the Dodger *The Numskulls *Fred (Fred's bed) *Jonny Bean *Charlie the Fox *Lewis Blair ==Other websites== *The Beano Comic web site Category:British weekly magazines
title: The Beano
